title: Gen AI, Agentic AI to significantly impact India's fast-growing payments landscape: Report
description: Artificial intelligence, particularly Gen AI and Agentic AI, is poised to significantly reshape India's burgeoning digital payments landscape. While UPI remains central, credit cards and BBPS are expected to spearhead the next wave of transformation, with transaction volumes projected to nearly triple by FY30.

title: Cisco rolls out chip designed to connect AI data centers over vast distances
description: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) -Cisco Systems launched on Wednesday a new networking chip designed to connect artificial intelligence data centers, with the cloud computing units of Microsoft and Alibaba enrolling as the chip's customers.
content:

title: Forget the degree, learn a trade: Nvidia CEO's message to the next generation
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has sparked a global debate by suggesting that in the age of artificial intelligence, electricians, plumbers, and mechanics may hold more value than traditional degree holders, a reminder that the future of work may depend as much on those who build the digital world as on those who programme it.
content:
Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has challenged a long-accepted belief, that a university degree is the best route to success. In an age driven by artificial intelligence, he says, practical skills may prove just as valuable as academic ones.

title: 1200 Students of CBitss Artificial Intelligence Program Secure Placements with Packages Ranging from INR 10
description: Chandigarh [India], October 8: In a remarkable achievement highlighting the growing potential of Artificial Intelligence (AI) education in India, as many as 1200 students from CBitss Artificial Intelligence Institute in Chandigarh have successfully secured placements with annual packages ranging from ₹10 lakh to ₹15 lakh in leading tech and analytics firms across the country.

title: SoftBank to acquire ABB’s robotics arm in $5.4 billion deal: All about Masayoshi Son's latest AI push
description: SoftBank Group will buy ABB's robotics business for $5.4 billion, aiming to integrate robotics with artificial intelligence. The move follows ABB's struggles in sales and profitability within the robots unit.
